cloudfiles_container_linked: ${user} linked the Cloud Files container ${container} to ${node}
cloudfiles_container_unlinked: ${user} unselected the Cloud Files container ${container} in ${node}
cloudfiles_file_added: ${user} added file ${path} to Cloud Files container ${container} in ${node}
cloudfiles_file_removed: ${user} removed ${path} in Cloud Files container ${container} in ${node}
cloudfiles_file_updated: ${user} updated file ${path} in Cloud Files container ${container} in ${node}
cloudfiles_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${path} in Cloud Files container ${container} in ${node}
cloudfiles_node_authorized: ${user} authorized the Cloud Files addon for ${node}
cloudfiles_node_deauthorized: ${user} deauthorized the Cloud Files addon for ${node}
